template.title: Apply For Veterans Pension Benefits
template.heading: Apply for Veterans pension benefits
template.description: Submit your VA pension application (VA Form 21P-527EZ) online now. Get step-by-step instructions, and consider signing in to save your in-progress application if you need to come back later to finish filling it out.

breadcrumbs_override.name: Manage dependents for disability, pension, or DIC benefits

template.title: Find VA Locations
template.description: Find a VA medical center, clinic, hospital, national cemetery, or VA regional office near you. You can search by city, state, postal code, or service. You'll get wait times and directions.
template.keywords: VA location by zip code, VA clinic, VA near me

template.title: How To Apply For A Discharge Upgrade
template.heading: How to apply for a discharge upgrade
template.description: Want to apply for a military discharge upgrade or correction? Get step-by-step instructions depending on your specific situation. If your discharge is upgraded, you'll be eligible for VA benefits you earned while serving.
template.keywords: upgrade discharge, military discharge upgrade, discharge upgrade
